items.title: Welcome to Spotifious!
items.subtitle: You need to configure a few more things before you can use Spotifious.

items.title: 1. Download & install PHP
items.subtitle: (suggested way: Homebrew) Spotifious needs PHP, no longer installed by default.

items.title: 2. Download & install Spotify
items.subtitle: Spotifious only works with the Spotify desktop app.

items.title: 3. Set your country code
items.subtitle: Choosing the correct country code makes sure you can play songs you select.

items.title: 4. Create a Spotify application
items.subtitle: Set up a Spotify application so you can search playlists!

items.title: 5. Link your Spotify application
items.subtitle: Connect your Spotify application to Spotifious to search your playlists.
